high_descs: Go to the desk behind you.
Take the vase from the desk.
Go to the lamp behind you.
anns.task_desc: View a vase by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn left begin walking across the room, once past the white table hang a left and walk to the end of the table, then turn left.
Pick up the glass vase off of the white table.
Turn around and walk over to the tall lamp in between the couch and the door.
anns.task_desc: Examine a glass vase in the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around, go to the right side of the white table, then face the white table.
Take the vase from the white table.
Turn around, go to the lamp to the left.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a vase near a lit lamp.
